properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Eo anivon'ahiahy
Mijere, Tompo ô, mijere.
Ory loatra ny fanahy,
Tompo tia ô, mijere.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Mihainoa fa miantso Anao
(Miantso Anao)
Mamlia fa mitalaho
(Mitalaho)
Tompo ô, rahoviana re ?
Efa niandry ela be (ela be).

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hodidinim-pahotana,
Mamonje Tompo ô, mamonje.
Tano 'ndrao tsy mahatana,
Tompo tia ô, mamonje.
Mihainoa, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ady lava isan'ora,
Manampia Tompo ô, manampia,
Isan'andro voakora,
Tompo tia ô, manampia.
Mihainoa, sns.
